title: Friends list not working correctly
body:
For some reason i can't move my friend groups up or down, it really annoys me as i can't have my buddies at the top of the list.
Does anyone else have the problem?

replies.body: I'm not having this problem. Did you change your summoner name at any point?
nope i've been wumachine since level 1 :I

You've tried dragging with the mouse, yeah?

I presume you have. What happens if you try repairing the game?
yeah i have, and i'm not repairing the game for a minor inconvenience, oh well i guess i'll just have to deal with it

That'd be the easiest course of action. Shame that I don't know some sort of quick fix for this.

Say, the most recent patch changed the friend tiles you see when you hover over your friends. Did that affect it in any way?
yeah the recent patch actually fixed it, thanks for the help man
